com.amazonaws.mobile.auth.ui

Class AuthUIConfiguration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobile.auth.ui.AuthUIConfiguration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AuthUIConfiguration

    public static class AuthUIConfiguration.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for building the AuthUIConfiguration object For example, create the config object with specific attributes. AuthUIConfiguration config = new AuthUIConfiguration.Builder() .userPools(true) .logoResId(logoResourceIdentifier) .signInButton(CustomSignInButton.class) .build();

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

      The Resource Identifier for the logo image passed by the user is stored in the config map.
